meanings.definition: A person or thing that moves or advances forward.
meanings.sent1: The forrarder led the group on the hike.
meanings.sent2: The forrarder of the team set a fast pace.
meanings.sent3: The forrarder squirrel raced ahead to find the best nuts.
meanings.sent4: The forrarder in the relay race sprinted like lightning.
meanings.sent5: The forrarder ship cut through the waves with determination.

meanings.definition: More forward in position or direction.
meanings.sent1: The forrarder seat on the bus was taken by an eager student.
meanings.sent2: The forrarder car in the race quickly took the lead.
meanings.sent3: The forrarder plants in the garden received the most sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The forrarder building in the city stood tall and proud.
meanings.sent5: The forrarder path through the forest was well-trodden by hikers.
